abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-0, in third shutout of season; other hockey news noted.

headline.print_headline: Lundqvist and Rangers Stifle Crosby and Blank Penguins
headline.main: Henrik Lundqvist and Rangers Stifle Penguins

snippet: Lundqvist, who recorded his 27th win of the season, led the Rangers past the host Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-0, on Wednesday night.
lead_paragraph: Lundqvist, who recorded his 27th win of the season, led the Rangers past the host Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-0, on Wednesday night.
